mapper.select: SELECT draft_document_code AS draftDocumentCode, draft_document_status AS draftDocumentStatus, draft_document_file_save_name AS draftDocumentFileSaveName, draft_document_member_name AS draftDocumentMemberName, draft_document_date AS draftDocumentDate, draft_document_final_approval_member_name AS draftDocumentFinalApprovalMemberName, draft_document_final_approval_date AS draftDocumentFinalApprovalDate, document_opinion_count AS documentOpinionCount, document_attatch_file_count AS documentAttatchFileCount FROM draft_document ORDER BY draft_document_date DESC
SELECT df.document_form_name AS documentFormName FROM draft_document AS dd JOIN document_form AS df ON dd.draft_document_code = df.draft_document_code WHERE draft_document_code= #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT dd.draft_document_member_name AS memberName, dd.draft_document_member_position_name AS memberPositionName,
pr.purchase_requisition_date AS purchaseRequisitionDate, pr.purchase_requisition_pay_day AS purchaseRequisitionPayDay, pr.purchase_requisition_total_price AS purchaseRequisitionTotalPrice, pr.purchase_requisition_item_category AS purchaseRequisitionItemCategory, pr.purchase_requisition_item AS purchaseRequisitionItem, pr.purchase_requisition_item_unit AS purchaseRequisitionItemUnit, pr.purchase_requisition_item_count AS purchaseRequisitionItemCount, pr.purchase_requisition_item_price AS purchaseRequisitionItemPrice, pr.purchase_requisition_etc AS purchaseRequisitionEtc FROM purchase_requisition AS pr JOIN draft_document AS dd ON pr.draft_document_code = dd.draft_document_code; WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT dd.draft_document_member_name AS memberName, dd.draft_document_member_position_name AS memberPositionName, dbd.department_name AS departmentName, dbd.member_name AS memberName, dbd.member_employee_code AS memberEmployeeCode, dbd.disbursement_document_account AS disbursementDocumentAccount, dbd.disbursement_document_terms_of_payment AS disbursementDocumentTermsOfPayment, dbd.disbursement_document_date AS disbursementDocumentDate, dbd.disbursement_document_request_date AS disbursementDocumentRequestDate, dbd.disbursement_document_account AS disbursementDocumentAccount, dbd.disbursement_document_expense_date AS disbursementDocumentExpenseDate, dbd.disbursement_document_subject AS disbursementDocumentSubject dbd.disbursement_document_contents AS disbursementDocumentContents, dbd.disbursement_document_customer AS disbursementDocumentCustomer, dbd.disbursement_document_price AS disbursementDocumentPrice, dbd.disbursement_document_methods_of_payment AS disbursementDocumentMethodsOfPayment, dbd.disbursement_document_etc AS disbursementDocumentEtc, dbd.disbursement_document_evidence AS disbursementDocumentEvidence FROM disbursement_document AS dbd JOIN draft_document AS dd ON dd.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT ad.department_name AS departmentName, ad.member_position_name AS memberPositionName, ad.member_name AS memberName, la.leave_application_date AS leaveApplicationDate, la.leave_category_sort AS leaveCategorySort, la.leave_application_start_day AS leaveApplicationStartDay, la.leave_application_end_day AS leaveApplicationEndDay, la.leave_application_day AS leaveApplicationDay, la.leave_application_hour AS leaveApplicationHour, la.leave_application_reason AS leaveApplicationReason, la.leave_detail_sort AS leaveDetailSort FROM leave_application AS la JOIN approval_document AS ad ON la.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT do.approval_opinion_desc AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.approval_registrant_name AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.document_opinion_date AS approvalOpinionDesc FROM document_opinion AS do JOIN approval_document AS ad ON do.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT do.approval_opinion_desc AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.approval_registrant_name AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.document_opinion_date AS approvalOpinionDesc FROM document_opinion AS do JOIN approval_document AS ad ON do.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}

SELECT do.approval_opinion_desc AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.approval_registrant_name AS approvalOpinionDesc, do.document_opinion_date AS approvalOpinionDesc FROM document_opinion AS do JOIN approval_document AS ad ON do.draft_document_code = ad.draft_document_code WHERE dd.draft_document_code = #{draftDocumentCode}
